description: Detects the use of SharpUp, a tool for local privilege escalation
name: SharpUp PrivEsc Tool
query: (process.executable.text:*\\SharpUp.exe OR winlog.event_data.Description:"SharpUp" OR process.command_line.text:(*HijackablePaths* OR *UnquotedServicePath* OR *ProcessDLLHijack* OR *ModifiableServiceBinaries* OR *ModifiableScheduledTask* OR *DomainGPPPassword*))
author: Florian Roth
